Articles.Content:
i installed all the requirements for better atmosphere mods, but when i install the better atmosphere mod the clouds are blurry...

i tried to install high res, but my ksp won't load when i do that...

need some help or some guidance on what to do about this... thank you

Edited October 10, 2014 by Terry.c.hickman
One of the requirements is EVE - which last time I looked was not updated for .25 and seemed to had problems still.
ive installed the eve mod alone to check to see if it worked, and it worked fine...
